website_summaries.verdict: Soft and breathable inner lining with nylon surface fabric provides great mix of durability and comfort for many sizes of dogs.
pros: Offers reflective straps for using the vest at night
Construction quality is high, according to many owners
cons: Pet owners say it's more of a starter vest
It can be difficult to order the right size

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Vest runs a bit small for standard sizing. Got the large and it JUST fits my 70lb lab mix. Although she is a touch chunky right now. Just keep this in mind when ordering. This vest is great. It’s moldable and came exactly as pictured with two service dog, and two in training patches. Shipping was incredibly fast. My only suggestion would be to add more Velcro. You can only have one patch on each side at a time. Would be nice to have service dog and in training on the same side. Or maybe in training on top or in front. Still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ellynn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Flexible
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, but would like to see other service dogs comfortable while working. We have scent detection labs as part of our pest control businesses. Our past service dogs vests were very rigid and I can't imagine very comfortable. The padding in this vest is really nice, especially for hard working dogs. The vest also feels well made. Lucky, our Lab/Grayhound mix is modeling his vest.
customer_reviews.author: William Buckley

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING customer service
customer_reviews.text: i ordered a medium for my american eskimo and it was a little too big for him. totally my mistake for not paying enough attention to the sizing chart and it was still a great quality vest. i got an email from the seller asking me how the vest was and i mentioned that it was a little big for my dog. they told me they would send me a size small and just to keep the larger one as well. completely unexpected customer service. they definitely went above and beyond and turned a regular transaction into an amazing experience.
customer_reviews.author: alexa wheelwright

customer_reviews.title: Fits great at 4 months and seems like it will adjust ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits great at 4 months and seems like it will adjust to my pups size as he grows fairly well. I will probably have to get a new one once full grown though. Seems sturdy too.
customer_reviews.author: NoxNoctura

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fit my dog perfectly and comfortably. He is an American Bulldog/ Lab mix with a fairly large chest and the XL fit him perfectly. At his height, the handle is also perfect for holding onto for stability. I am very excited about this vest and will definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AngieT.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it - color may be a bit off in person, but good vest/harness
customer_reviews.text: I like it alot- in person the color is duller and more flat blue unlike the turquoise in the picture but- i like the large attachment ring, the handle stitching may come apart with use (only drawback..) - may want to size up if your dog is on the larger end on the measurements - it fits my pit just right though 👍👍 the patches are easily seen from afar 😁😁👌👌
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too lose for now...
customer_reviews.text: Try a size Large for my 40lbs German Shepherd puppy (4 mths old), nope... too lose and will have to wait for him to grow into the size Large in a couple months. Otherwise, the product looks sturdy and nice on my pup... 5/12/19 update👉🏻My pup 7mths old fit into the vest at weight 62lbs. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Neuheisel

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect I have a 23lb mini Aussie male and it fits perfectly - it's very adjustable. Soft padded with 2 service dog patches and one do not pet patch.
customer_reviews.author: Susan in Fort Worth

customer_reviews.title: Not all it seem to be
customer_reviews.text: I got the item originally in a timely manner. It was not as pictured it had stupid Velcro words that said xtreme dog not "service dog" like pictured so I bought new Velcro words on my own $20 more. I have owned this same vest before I lost it great quality but after a few months the clips has broken. Great product if you plan on upkeeping it like a car.
customer_reviews.author: GodCracker

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best service dog vest I’ve had so far! My dog has a wider chest than an average dog and it’s hard to find an affordable vest that comfortably fits him. It’s breathable, extremely adjustable for any shape dog, and durable. One problem I’ve had in the past is the Velcro patch letters flaking off very easily, but so far the patches are really durable! Considering how cheap this vest is, I’m impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Monson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy harness, iffy sizing chart
customer_reviews.text: This is a great harness. I love the handle on the top and it pulls in all the right spots so as not to choke my pup. My one issue is the sizing guide. My dog is considered a large dog by weight standards, but the large size harness I ordered was way too big. Even after tightening the straps all around to the tightest setting, there was still a gap that I wasn’t comfortable with. I’m returning the large size and definitely exchanging it for a smaller size. Other than that, it’s a solid purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Sternberg

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Size medium fits my 5 month old Labrador with some room to grow. He doesn’t seem to mind the thing at all, there’s zero shifting and it appears to be very well made. I’ll be buying the larger size once he’s full size. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. L.

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small or SHORT in length for a Belgian Malinois
customer_reviews.text: Although the measurements fit (Neck and chest girth) Separately.) There was not enough LENGTH between the 2 when in all went together. A Belgian Malinois is Tall and slender so I DID purchase a Medium as that is the measurement range she fit into. However she is a 65 pound Mal and the length from her neck to the strap that goes under her chest was to short and it dug in under her legs. I am going to return and maybe try a different brand. To bad...This is a NICE VEST, and I LOVE that it came with the extra in training patches. It is made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Krueger

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it wouldn't be THE BEST quality because its 20 bucks how great can it be? i was wrong. This is an amazing vest. Its thick and durable, the patches are really nice quality and no fraying. And D ring is nice quality as well as the straps. Will be purchasing again when my puppy outgrows this one.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette P.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: High quality-looks professional! I'm a dog trainer and this is the only in training vest I buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expeted
customer_reviews.text: This is not what I expected I have to dogs in my house and I bought 2 different sizes and they both open from the buckle at all the times i did not have time to return this I work too much but my babysitter that takes them out every day told me the buckle continues to open, one day last week the buckle came loose and the dog almost got killed by the car. I will never buy this item again, I'm trying to get something stronger that the buckle does not opens o its own. I hope to find something good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Samos Guardia

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Great Value Can’t Beat It!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this service dog harness about a year ago now and I had to come back to write a review because it has been through rain, snow, sun, creeks, and everything in between with my autistic son and had withstood it all! It still looks and works just like the first day we used it for our GSD. It fits her perfectly and never seems to be uncomfortable for her. Not only that but I loved that it came with both “IN TRAINING” patches and “SERVICE DOG” patches, that was perfect for the year she was in service dog training now she gets to wear her service dog patches proudly!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda F

customer_reviews.title: How do I correct the size from XL to a Large.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this harness for my 1 yo german shepherd female. She is 70#, and her nIeck and chest girth are marginal between a size lrg and x lrg. The reviews listed advised to go up a size when ordering. I did so, and when I received the vest today it is way too big. I adjusted the vest as small as possible and it is still too big. When walking it rotates sideways. The vest looks good, well made, and appears to be sturdy. But I need a vest that she can wear now. I need to know what I need to do to correct this issue. I ordered an XL, but apparently I should have gotten a large.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Bad design for service dog vest and harness
customer_reviews.text: I got this harness with a handle on top to help me with my mobility issues when used with my service great Dane. In theory it looks great on the site but in practice the handle was too heavy and so when my Dane walks, the harness lists heavily to the side of the dog.Not well-designed at all and not suitable for service animals. They need to get a much better design that does not flop over on the side while the dog is wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Carla May

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, highly recommend this vest.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a replacement for my husbands service dog as he outgrew his vest (different brand). Great quality. Love the grip of the handle and the black vest is perfect for our boy. The x-large fits our GSD perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lori M

customer_reviews.title: Well made, fits great and BIG enough for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is nice. Very well made, and it actually fits my giant dog. He weighs about 135 lns and this thing could still go bigger. I bought the XXL and I'm glad I did. He's a big boy and this fits him great. I was actually really impressed when I opened it up. Pretty sturdy and tough looking for sure. I think it was a great deal. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Paranoid Survivor

customer_reviews.title: Tough to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made but you better pack a lunch trying to adjust this thing, I'm a construction worker and put on safety harnesses all the time, this one defies any experience or logic.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse James

customer_reviews.title: Sizing chart has to be off.
customer_reviews.text: Sizing seems small. The vest is great quality but I followed the measures completely and this vest is just too small. Based on the sizing chart, it is like a mini vest. Not sure if I can use it. I have another service dog and this was for my puppy in training. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, simple collar
customer_reviews.text: Nice collar! I love the color and it seems very durable. My dog has white fur and her previous leather collar leaked red dye all over her neck and looked terrible. No pesky dyes from this one. Runs true to size. My dog is still growing and is on the smallest hole. This should fit her once she reaches her full size last her for a very long time. We also have the matching leash which is also good quality and softening up nicely. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Piper

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly. And Finally got the right size in a dog vest for once. Fit's my 65 lbs female boxer perfect and she doesn't seem to notice it. Lots of extra space if she gains some weight. Love the added Velcro strips at top for ID or whatever tags that could be added. Strong, good stitching. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lawhorn

customer_reviews.title: A lot for your money.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product for the price. It has two extra security features to ensure the vest won't come off the dog. Plus, it is padded. You get a clicker, a poop bag container, and two sets of velcro labels. One set for IN TRAINING and the other for SERVICE DOG. For the price, quality, different colors, and all that you get with this, makes it worth your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t look any further
customer_reviews.text: I own a Great Pyrenees. For those that know they are very large dogs. We haven’t been able to find a vest suitable and large enough for him. This vest is so perfect. Amazing quality. Big enough with room for him to grow. He absolutely loves it. I don’t have to wrestle to get an arm through because it slips right over his head and clasps under his belly. Nice patting on the inside too. For the price point you cannot beat this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shalece Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Great starter harness for a real service dog.
customer_reviews.text: I got a dog to self train for my own service dog (I've trained for others and found myself in need of one). I saw other vests that I liked but we more than I could afford at the time. I was very skeptical about this vest. But it's turned out to be a good vest. My dog doesn't give me any issues wearing it seems to breathe well and not overheat him. I only wish that the body of the harness was longer. But for a "starter harness" it's been a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight product.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lightweight breathable vest for long hot outings. Fit for large dog such as mine is well within the adjustable range. Purchased one for my dog and one for another. Will buy again as price can't be beat for quality delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Great harness
customer_reviews.text: This harness is really nice. I ordered a medium. My dog measured 20in around her neck and 22 around her chest. It cuts into her legs a bit, I'm going to watch for signs of rub. I'm possibly going to exchange it for a large. According to the chart, there should be plenty of room for growth. My dog is a 5 month old german shephard. Shephards tend to be a bit long. The harness is beautiful, just to short for her build. It is an extremely nice harness and I'm really hoping the larger size works out. Update: customer service is amazing, they helped me resolve my issue within days. I am using the size large and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon williams

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It's not big and bulky
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It's not big and bulky, so it's comfortable to my dog to wear. The clip for the leash is nice and big and the handle is very sturdy. I have a large, strong dog and I trust the material with him. A large fits a 65 lbs pitmix very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Janowski

customer_reviews.title: Easily ID service vest, lightweight, & durable!
customer_reviews.text: The Fairwin Service Vest/Harness provides a comfortable fit for my dog and has easy on/off access. Unlike other vests that click behind the front legs and rub the dog uncomfortably, the secure click is on the side and the band adjustable to meet the dogs precise girth. The letters illuminate well and are clearly visible to passerby’s. The vest is also durable and lightweight. I would highly recommend this vest!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love this vest
customer_reviews.text: I have a small Maltese mix. I bought the small and it fits him perfectly. It's comfortable and he doesn't even seem to know he is wearing it. Love the quality. It came with two sets of patches. "In Training" and "Service Dog"
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Wait till your puppy is DONE GROWING 😉
customer_reviews.text: So far really good quality material ! Was definitely smaller than I thought, and than what the chart said . I WOULD buy it again. I do have a pure bred black lab who comes from a very large line so from when I ordered it to when I got it he grew. I think if your dog is done growing and going to stay the size they are I might get one size up . This way u can scale it down if you need to. Mine looks like I'm going to run out of room very soon.
customer_reviews.author: michele mcmahon

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my actual post on my dog group: Look at these amazing harnesses I bought for the dogs to be harnessed in the Jeep when the top is off. They can be put on and off with one hand. We already had one from last year and I was so pleased with them that I bought everyone their own :) You wouldn't believe how much they cost... All 5 of my dog's from Flora to Diesel, wear size large.
customer_reviews.author: William R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect harness
customer_reviews.text: This harness works great. Perfect fit for my service dog - a Cairn Terrier. It is easy to put it on and take off my dog. And, the seat belt goes through the handle making it easy to safely travel with my dog. Color is brilliant. Works great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is a little off - reviews stated this ran small , so I went XL , should have gotten a large . The quality seems great . I just wish it was a better fit. Not even a week into use the leash hook broke completely off .
customer_reviews.author: Dionysius Von Klinetz

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an XL for my pit bull after reading a review that the large barely fit their dog. It was a little bulky and didn't lay all the way flat but I don't think a large would have fit him. Also I don't see why they needed to add big buckles and straps on the front. They are pretty much useless. It will do until I can afford something better.
customer_reviews.author: TuesdaysWithM

customer_reviews.title: My dog does not like it, but that could just be my dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog does not like it, but that could just be my dog. His other vests he doesn't seem to mind but i think it's uncomfortable around his front legs for him. Overall though, it is made very well and its very sturdy and clean looking. I like the detachable velcro panels that let you display different things, such as "service dog" or "do not pet."
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Too bulky to be useful on small (15 lbs.) dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have a 15 lbs Havanese. The fit is too heavy and slips from side to side since there is no t-bar to connect the front. It will often twist sideways just from walking and he shakes in it often, indicating that it’s not pleasant to wear. For larger dogs, maybe it won’t have the same issues. The materials seem to be sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Flower

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Very strong, slightly bulky. So really pay attention to the sizing and even go down a size when in doubt. I think my harness is a little too big for my 50 lbs boxer. During the therapy dog training I realized it was actually distracting her more than helping her realize we were working. Trainer recommended we take it off as it was too big for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for big dogs!
customer_reviews.text: This product did wonders, after putting this on my dog he was so more obedient. He actually listened to what we would say. Its so much better than having a neck collar and its a lot more dog friendly. He loves having it on and you can carry them as well with the handle on top. My dog Chunky loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Fairwin service dog vest
customer_reviews.text: I am returning mine because the strap rubs behind his front legs:(. I love the vest! It’s not cumbersome and light enough to avoid the dog getting too hot. It’s quality made and would have been perfect if it didn’t rub behind my dogs legs!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Well made!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Using this on our 7 month old (120lb.) Cane Corso. Made sturdy and not cheap feeling at all! UPDATE: 5 months later... Still holding up great!!! She got too big, so I will be ordering a new one!
customer_reviews.author: SamieSue2

customer_reviews.title: Cool and breathable, comfortable and rugged. A great investment.
customer_reviews.text: My dog does not like wearing a conventional service dog vest but she LOVES this one. Very well constructed, nice reflective trim. The only thing it did not have is leg extenders for my dog's legs since she is a little short for her breed. I get compliments all the time on how nice her harness is.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get on & off
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a 4.5 if I could. Exchanged the med for a large for our Vizsla mix as she has such a deep chest & the med was just a hair too smug. The large is just a touch loose on her neck and yes we have tightened it but it's not bad at all. Light weight, easy to get on & off, easy clip for her leash. Cant officially say in durable since it's so new to us, but it seems as though it will last a long time. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Rivera

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and soft. Good fit for puppy after adjusting to him. I love that it came with different patches to easily change out for training and service dog. The handle is a good touch as well to keep them nearby as needed. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: MissCasciano

customer_reviews.title: Lovin’ this
customer_reviews.text: Although my dog isn’t a service dog, and I don’t use her as one. I am elderly and the handle on the vest helps me lift my elderly dog into my truck. The vest is sturdy and very well made. Thank you for making a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennae Arrias

customer_reviews.title: Medium Runs a little Smaller
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I was sent one that didn't go through qc, it's a bit smaller than advertised. By about 2 inches on chest and neck. I was sure to measure my dog before ordering, and this is pretty snug on him and in his armpits.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Never trust a Democrat to guess the right size
customer_reviews.text: Measure your dogs neck and body lengths and even a Democrat can compare the results to the chart for the right size vest for their own dog. I am not sure if they are competent enough to pick the color! The right person picked the good materials and put it together it is very tough and well made. I would recommend it to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Sword of Truth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I measured my dog and the harness fit perfectly. I will definitely buy another one for my other dog. I’ve bought other harnesses in the past but this one blows them all out of the park. WE LOVE IT (I bought the “DO NOT PET” patch separately)
customer_reviews.author: Molly House

customer_reviews.title: Fits already.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the Xl. I have a German Shepherd that is training for search and rescue. right now at 4 months he is 55 pounds. It is a little bit loose in the belly but the chest fits well already. Love that it came with the in training patches because that’s exactly where we are at. Seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: amandan

customer_reviews.title: Service vest is accepted everywhere! No ?
customer_reviews.text: This harness is really great especially if you want to get your dog into places that don’t t take dogs, they dont even question us taking our girl on the restaurant patio, etc. it’s a little snug but still a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Size runs big.
customer_reviews.text: The service vest for dogs is made well. It is thick and sturdy. The only issue was that the size was bigger than expected, so we had to order a smaller size. Our dog is a chihuahua mix and about 10 pounds so we ordered a medium. She was swimming in it, so we ordered a small and kept the medium just in case she grew or gained weight. Other than that. it's really nice and doesn't bother her at all.
customer_reviews.author: Darlenen R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for full Service Dog
customer_reviews.text: The fit was accurate for my type of Service Dog. It is very durable & sturdy, We've had it for a few years now. Con: Only thing is once in a while the strap adjuster belt runs a bit, but not so bad. I can deal with that.
customer_reviews.author: GeekYgadget-gal

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my service dog in training. If you are looking for a service dog harness or something to instruct others about your dog, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy bigger than what they tell you in sizing.
customer_reviews.text: Sizes are not actually true. I really needed to get a bigger one. I have it at the largest sizing of the large and it is barely getting the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Anderson

customer_reviews.title: the attachment point broke after a couple months
customer_reviews.text: As beefy as this attachment point looks it could not handle a 45 pound dog. It has a nice looking box stitch. Maybe not finished, definitely not double stitched and the thread looks weak. Since I am in the market now for a new harness Chai's choice looks like a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Washais

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: It’s already falling apart from the neck and her Velcro service dog stopped working and fell off so I’m looking at having to buy her a new one soon
customer_reviews.author: Joanna and Charles Zuelzke

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product... but we're missing something..
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, very durable and my pup loves it. But, it came with 2 service dog patches and that's it. No "in training". Make sure to buy a size larger if your dog is still growing! (edit: We messaged the creators and they sent us an extra pair of patches. Nice people, and we really appreciate it!)
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Best harness ever
customer_reviews.text: My dog breaks out of everything. His heavy duty crate, his collar, and any other harness I buy, but this harness is the one thing I feel 100% confident that he’s 100% secure and safe. It’s really nice because the buckles actually lock, so I can use my doggie seat belt with it and I know he’s much safer than if he wasn’t retrained. I also like to use it when we’re walking in more trafficked areas, so if he starts to pull his leash I can keep him from breaking away and Running off.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie

customer_reviews.title: Me likey
customer_reviews.text: Worked wonderfully for Little Bear and has lasted for months already in excellent condition. No loose threads or scuffs on it. I will say though that he has taken this off by himself a few times so if your service dog is a harness escape artist you should go for a different harness.
customer_reviews.author: Queen

customer_reviews.title: Worked Out Well Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Works well and adjustable fit is comfortable. Helps to control your dog. no more hard pulling or jumping when used on a smaller, under 40 pound dog in my experience.Once you set the fit it is just one clip to put on and off, put over dog's head and close clip on side ready to go
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Awkward fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased large size for my 60 lb husky, and the harness fits well in the body but the fit across the chest is horrible. When you adjust and tighten the chest straps it’s bunchy and awkward. Only way to make it look “ normal” is to have it fully extended. Unless you have a dog with a large chest dont bother .
customer_reviews.author: Tails_of_Skye

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vest very well made!!! The patches are wonderful! This vest will be with us for awhile I think... all the others I viewed looked so flimsy. This harness also looks great on my GS puppy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cyntenia

customer_reviews.title: Nice harness
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and off we have a Alaskan sled dog and was comfortable for her and didn’t seem to bother her
customer_reviews.author: kasey doran

customer_reviews.title: No assembly instructions provided!
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to assemble because the product doesn’t come with any instructions at all. But once you figure it out it’s very comfortable for the animal it seems. The seller does not seem to provide a lot of instructions on how to fit your animal.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dog so I didn’t have to choke him when we are out in public.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Dixson

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: Generally works very well. After extended use, some fraying around the main strap that goes across the front of the chest.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T. Huss

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for service dog and he seem to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too big!
customer_reviews.text: I got my GSD an XL, based on their measurements guide, but it was way too big. I tried adjusting the straps but they were at their ends. So I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: GSDMOM

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS HARNESS!!!! The only downfall to this harness is there’s little to no Velcro for the “in training” band. We bought a size large, for my 7 month old German Shepherd. FITS AMAZING!!! Plus she still has growing room. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Krys Lynn

customer_reviews.title: awesome harness
customer_reviews.text: Have had for about 6 months now. Works great. Heald up awesome. My dog seems to enjoy wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Quinno

customer_reviews.title: Ok there measurements aren’t correct, should of said they run small!
customer_reviews.text: So I gave it the reviews I did because it did not fit, I love this dog and want to know best!! Seems they run a few inches off!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Oden

customer_reviews.title: Durable material and great quality
customer_reviews.text: This harness is awesome. Fits so comfortable around my biological doggy. I love the handle and the buckle if I choose a leash. It is not tight around his neck it sits on his chest. Which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn’t even seem to notice he has it on ! I love it hahah easy to adjust and flexible . Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mireya franco

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay - I kept it and didn’t return
customer_reviews.text: The harness is nice it does look more like a harness then a service harness. Even if my dog fits it ,still seems loose and it sticks up. My GSD doesn’t get out of it but the man down side is my gsd can take of his patches by himself . I have a picture of his original one and this one
customer_reviews.author: snippy

customer_reviews.title: Fit just like it said
customer_reviews.text: Fit just like it said . Very nice for a small dog. We have a 10lb Chihuahua. It fit him perfect. Nicely made sturdy and came with 3 patches. 2 service animal and one Service animal in training.
customer_reviews.author: Billy W. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Works PERFECT...no more choking.
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable; nice snug fit; pulls on the dog's chest, not his throat. Get one; you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell A. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: A must have for a large dog!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best harness I have had so far! Easy on and off, love the Velcro labels that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Durable and has 2 sets of tags in training and service dogs which can be changed through velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Vigi

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous design
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing quality. I’m very impressed at the durability of it. My dog and I roamed the hills all summer and it still looks and works like new. Fabulous design
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Rosenberger

customer_reviews.title: Nice vest
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice vest. The main buckle is a lot beefier than is necessary so if you have week hands this isn’t for you.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect size for my Rat Terrier and I like the quality.
customer_reviews.author: claybaby

customer_reviews.title: Service leash and vest
customer_reviews.text: Amazing durability, my dog loves it, easy on/off, doesnt irritate his skin, and size is flexible. I had seen many ads and read many reviews, but, I am truly pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but perfect for what I needed it for
customer_reviews.text: Fidgety to adjust, but perfect for what I needed it for, which was using the "in training" labels to convince people to stay away from my rescue pups that are, well, in training. Doesn't work all the time, but that's the fault of people, not the vest. :)
customer_reviews.author: TheGastons

customer_reviews.title: Fairwin Service Vest Dog Harness
customer_reviews.text: Overall not a bad product, it fit and it's function are good. delivery time was excellent, i suspect that was because it was in a warehouse less than 200 miles from me. I usually don't write reviews because I believe if you have to ask your not doing it right. As for as durability don't know only had it a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it looks great on my dog. She got it as she just turned 1yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Rey Rey

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s different than the usual harnesses I’ve used for my dog. But this one goes on really easy, comes with in training Velcro as well :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole s

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We were surprised at the quality and comfort- Great product!
customer_reviews.author: SixSigmaJoe

customer_reviews.title: NOPE.
customer_reviews.text: This harness is fantastic until your dog realizes it can drop its head and back out of the harness. Then the harness is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sterling

customer_reviews.title: To small for big dogs
customer_reviews.text: Size isn’t accurate. It’s smaller than described, if you have a lab size dog I’d look for a different harness.
customer_reviews.author: Wingedwheeler

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I got my harness today, it fits my dog well, is adjustable, seems very well made and sturdy. I wish the chest part Velcro was a little better fit. But over all is great, I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my 2 year old, 70 pound, German Shepard. Fits good and makes our walks more humane, seeing how he isnt being choked by a collared leash, as dogs like to lead the average walker.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Made to take a beating
customer_reviews.text: My dog wears this most of the day while we are out and I see no signs of the material either, wearing or unraveling nor has the black color faded on the straps. I also love the Large Velcro tags. It came with a set of two, (one says service dog and the other says In training).
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A.

customer_reviews.title: Good comfort
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is 68 lbs and this still fits well. Good durability and good controllability as long as it is on tight (same with any harness). This would not significantly help control a really hyper dog though.
customer_reviews.author: mommy of 4

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put on and take off. Fits my mastiff well.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah H.

customer_reviews.title: It runs VERY small!
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be for my Great Dane puppy who is in training to be my service dog. I meassured his chest at 24 inches and neck at 19 inches, so I got the medium which says it fits chest from 24-32 inches and neck from 20-24 inches, my puppy is still the same measurments, this harness is so tiny it doesn't even do up on him when fully extended! Very displeased, a total waste of my money. Now I have to order a new vest else where and wait even longer.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: I have a 65-67lb golden retriever and the large was ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 65-67lb golden retriever and the large was too tight on the largest setting. Cannot say how durable it is due to not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. deBarba

customer_reviews.title: Great dog vest!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this vest, very comfortable for my dog, also a great handle grip and I like how you can change the Velcro pieces on it to “In training” or “service dog”
customer_reviews.author: LV

product_meta.title: Fairwin Service Vest Dog Harness - Adjustable Nylon with Removable Reflective Patches for Service Dogs Large Medium Small Sizes
product_meta.description:
Size:M:chest 24"-32";neck 20"-26"| Color:Black
🐶 About Fairwin Service Vest Dog Harness 🐶

♣ Material: 1000D high quality Nylon fabric,soft inner.
♣ Adjustable Neck and Chest Strap:This service dog vest has adjustable neck and chest strap,they can easily be customized to your dog.
If you find that the size under the dog's neck from the dog's shoulder blade is too narrow, Please adjust the strap (the sliding buckle can be adjusted to the maximum through the loop) on the Valcro to the right size.
♣ Dog’s Neck Measure Way: Please refer to picture 5, neck-wrap measuring tape across the dog's shoulder blade to approximately 2 inch below the dog’s neck.
♣ Dog’s Chest Girth: Please measure around the widest part of the rib cage.
♣ Size(Approx):
XXL: suit for chest 34"-46";neck:31"-37"; 100-165 lb dog.
XL: suit for chest 33"-43"; neck:26"-33"; 62-100 lb dog.
L: suit for chest 28"-37";neck 23"-29"; 51-66 lb dog.
M : suit for chest 24"-32";neck 20"-26"; 31-55 lb dog.
S : suit for chest 20"-25";neck 16"-20";13-33 lb dog.
XS: suit for chest 18"-21"; neck:11"-14"; 7-15 lb dog.
♣ Attention: Weight is for reference only, please take chest girth as the main basis of choice. 

🐶 Notice 🐶

Fairwin is an experienced team which focus on high-end Pet Supplies . But sometimes because of the different display color factors and
shooting when ambient light and other factors, so in a sense of color and material will be slightly different , Hope your understanding .

🐶 Feedback 🐶

If you are satisfied with our service and products , please kindly leave us a positive feedback. Your recognition will make us more confident to develop
business and serve you better. Thank you!

🐶 Package Included 🐶
♣1 x Dog Vest with a pair of “SERVICE DOG” Patches.
♣1 x a pair of “IN TRAINNING”Patches.
feature_bullets: 【Comfortable Design】-Padded back & neck straps completed by breathable mesh lining. Best service dog vest for your lovely friend.

【Solid Design and Craftsmanship】 - Made from sturdy, high quality nylon, with removable "SERVICE DOG" patches, a stainless steel D-Ring for leashes and ID tags and an upgraded top-mounted standing handle, this service dog jacket is a must have item for your dog’s wardrobe.
【Gift For Your Dog】-This service dog vest will be the best gift for your dog.

【Size Measuring】 - Use a soft measuring tape. Measure all the way around the rib cage, full circle. Your dog must be standing. Check out our helpful Size Chart in Picture 5th for reference. As a general rule of thumb, if your dog's measurement falls on the maximum end of one size, always order the next size up.
【Best Warranty】20 months warranty and 60-day hassle-free return policy.
